राजस्थान सरकार का उपक्रम
1. Centre for Electronic Governance is an automonous body of Government of Rajasthan under the Department of Technical Education. Foundation stone of CEG was laid down on 8th December 2006.\n
2. Rajasthan is the second state that is running this programme after the highly acclaimed and successful program "Jawahar Knowledge centre" in Andhra pradesh.\n

3. CEG get recognition in IT Training programs like CCNA Trainings, ASP.NET Training, ASP.NET MVC using Razor , Entity Framework , WCF , PHP, Auto CAD, Red Hat Certification trainings, C, C++, Linux Training program, Embedded Training programs etc.\n
4. We also Conduct Summer Trainings programs for MCA, M.Sc., B.Tech, M.Tech and for Diploma students. \n

5. The CEG has been established with a slone aim to provide a conducive environment for creating industry employable IT professionals by the way of arranging seminars lectures, vocational trainings and industry revelant software training.\n
6. CEG is also study Centre of IGNOU for MCA, BCA, CIT, PGDIS and ACISE programs. CEG started software development and Live Project training to give exposure of real time applications to students.\n
1. All Training programs are approved by technical education of Rajasthan.
2. Regional academy of CISCO in North India.
3. Highest number of students trained by CEG.
4. Well Equipped labs of more then 170 computers with fibre 20MBPS connectivity.
5. Education partner of Microsoft, Red Hat, Auto desk and Cisco etc.
6. Discount on certification exam fee i.e , Cisco, and RedHat as per service provider norms.
7. CEG is Microsoft Academy.
8. Trainings provided by experienced and certified faculty.
9. Our Training Programs covers advance technology, features and topics.
10. Demo Classes facility is also available.
11. Class timing is usually convenient for students. Morning and evening batches also available.
12. Trainings provided on latest configured equipments like switches, Routers, Computers and software.
13. Limited Seats and batches
14. Our Trainings are not more expensive. We are getting very nominal fee as compared to other institutes.
15. Learn the latest and trending skills required in the industry
16. Master intermediate level skills to develop wide range and categories of rich and intuitive apps
17. Benefit from the comprehensive curriculum targeting multiple platforms so that you are ready for native app development
At the same time provides a readymade platform interaction between the industry and the trained workforce.\n
